Greetings to Armenian Prime Minister 
    Pyongyang, November 18 (KCNA) -- Premier of the DPRK cabinet Hong Song Nam sent a message of greetings to Aram Sarkisyan on his appointment as Prime Minister of Armenia.   He expressed the belief that the friendly relations between the two countries would further develop on good terms, and wished the Armenian Prime Minister success in his responsible work.

articles.title: Paek Nam Sun meets UN official
articles.content:
Greetings to Azerbaijan Foreign Minister 
    Pyongyang, November 18 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun sent a message of greetings to Vilayet Mukhtar Gulyev on his appointment as Azerbaijan Foreign Minister.   In the message he expressed the belief that the relations between the two countries would further develop on good terms, and wished him success in his responsible work.

articles.content:
Paek Nam Sun meets UN official 
    Pyongyang, November 18 (KCNA) -- Paek Nam Sun, Foreign Minister of the DPRK, today met and had a talk with David Morton, newly appointed UN resident coordinator and the resident representative of the United Nations Development Program in Pyongyang who paid a courtesy call on him.
